title: If the Agency fails to identify the slum dwellers needed to be shifted for a vital public purpose, a
clause_text: If the Agency fails to identify the slum dwellers needed to be shifted for a vital public purpose, as above, then the tenements so constructed shall be offered;

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
